title: Problem Breakdown
text: To solve this problem, we will break it up into two parts- the multiplication and the subtraction.

title: Distributive Property Explanation
text: The distributive property is defined as when you multiply a number by a sum or difference, you have to multiply each term of the sum or difference by that number.

title: Solving Products
text: Solve the most difficult product in the larger product in the beginning.

title: Solving Products
text: In this case, we will solve $${\left(4t-7\right)}^2$$ first. What is it equal to?

title: Solving Products
text: Use FOIL (and the distributive property) to multiple by $$4t$$ by $$4t-7$$ and $$-7$$ by $$4t-7$$.

title: Splitting Sums
text: Split one of the $$\frac{sums}{differences}$$ into its individual terms, to use the distributive property with.

title: Splitting Sums
text: In this case, we will split the $$4x+1$$ into $$4x$$ and $$1$$.

title: Multiplying Individual Terms
text: Multiply each term from the split difference to the other $$\frac{sum}{difference}$$.

title: Simplication
text: Simplify like terms in the sum. Like terms are terms of the same degree. After simplification, what is the final polynomial result?
